directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Place unwrapped Brie on parchment paper.
Bake until Brie is soft but not melted, 10 to 12 minutes. Cut into slices and place on top of Original Pretzel Crisps®. Finish with cranberry sauce for a festive holiday app.
ingredients: 1 (7.2 ounce) package Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
title: Cranberry-Brie Holiday Bites
